data.title: 🐛[BUG]yarn install命令 antd2.4.5会报错
data.body:
### 🐛 bug 描述


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13188169/82885874-4de58200-9f78-11ea-9964-12c843a3b2d3.png)

PS C:\Users\joe_du\Documents\GitHub\SmartBuildings> yarn install
yarn install v1.22.4
[1/5] Validating package.json...
[2/5] Resolving packages...
success Already up-to-date.
$ umi g tmp
Invalid or unexpected token
C:\Users\joe_du\Documents\GitHub\SmartBuildings\node_modules\antd\lib\style\index.less:1
@import './themes/index';
^

SyntaxError: Invalid or unexpected token
    at wrapSafe (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1116:16)
    at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1164:27)
    at Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1220:10)
    at Object.newLoader [as .js] (C:\Users\joe_du\Documents\GitHub\SmartBuildings\node_modules\pirates\lib\index.js:104:7)
    at Module.load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1049:32)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:937:14)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1089:19)
    at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:73:18)
    at Object.<anonymous> (C:\Users\joe_du\Documents\GitHub\SmartBuildings\node_modules\antd\lib\layout\style\index.js:3:1)
    at Module._compile (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1200:30)
error Command failed with exit code 1.
info Visit https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/install for documentation about this command.
PS C:\Users\joe_du\Documents\GitHub\SmartBuildings>

data.title: 🐛[BUG]无法创建工程npm create umi
data.body:
### 🐛 bug 描述

使用
`npm create umi`
`yarn create umi`
命令，选择类型：ant-design-pro，抛出异常如下：

(node:59887) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Error: Cannot find module 'core-js-pure/stable/object/define-property'
Require stack:
- /Users/leo/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/@babel/runtime-corejs3/core-js-stable/object/define-property.js

- /Users/leo/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/eslint-plugin-react/index.js

- /Users/leo/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/create-umi/lib/run.js
- /Users/leo/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/create-umi/cli.js
Referenced from: /Users/leo/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/eslint-config-airbnb/index.js
Referenced from: /Users/leo/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/eslint-config-airbnb-typescript/index.js
Referenced from:
    at Function.Module._resolveFilename (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1029:15)
    at Function.Module._load (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:898:27)
    at Module.require (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1089:19)
    at require (internal/modules/cjs/helpers.js:73:18)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/leo/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/@babel/runtime-corejs3/core-js-stable/object/define-property.js:1:18)

    at Object.Module._extensions..js (internal/modules/cjs/loader.js:1220:10)

(Use `node --trace-warnings ...` to show where the warning was created)

This error originated either by throwing inside of an async function without a catch block, or by rejecting a promise which was not handled with .catch(). To terminate the node process on unhandled promise rejection, use the CLI flag `--unhandled-rejections=strict` (see https://nodejs.org/api/cli.html#cli_unhandled_rejections_mode). (rejection id: 2)
(node:59887) [DEP0018] DeprecationWarning: Unhandled promise rejections are deprecated. In the future, promise rejections that are not handled will terminate the Node.js process with a non-zero exit code.

data.title: 🧐[问题] build 后还存在 es6 的代码（Umi@2.13.13）
data.body: ### 🧐 问题描述 执行 build 命令后，打包生成的 umi.js 中包含 const、=> 这些 es6 代码，在 ie11 上运行报错 打包后的代码： ### 🚑 其他信息 config.ts 中已经配置了 targets： `targets: { ie: 11, },` 依赖： "@ant-design/icons": "^4.1.0", "@ant-design/pro-layout": "^5.0.12", "@ant-design/pro-table": "^2.2.9", "@antv/data-set": "^0.11.4", "ace-builds": "^1.4.11", "antd": "^4.2.5", "bizcharts": "^3.5.9", "bizcharts-plugin-slider": "^3.0.1", "classnames": "^2.2.6", "dva": "^2.6.0-beta.16", "dva-model-extend": "^0.1.2", "form-render": "^0.5.5", "lodash": "^4.17.11", "moment": "^2.26.0", "omit.js": "^1.0.2", "path-to-regexp": "2.4.0", "qs": "^6.9.4", "react": "^16.13.1", "react-ace": "^8.1.0", "react-copy-to-clipboard": "^5.0.1", "react-dom": "^16.13.1", "react-helmet": "^5.2.1", "redux": "^4.0.1", "umi": "^2.13.13", "umi-plugin-antd-icon-config": "^1.0.2", "umi-plugin-pro-block": "^1.3.2", "umi-plugin-react": "^1.15.8", "umi-request": "^1.3.2", "use-merge-value": "^1.0.1"

data.title: 🐛[BUG]第一次载入页面，菜单仅图标时，图标没有居中
data.body: ### 🐛 bug 第一次载入页面，菜单仅图标时，图标没有居中 第一次载入页面，如果屏幕宽度不够，菜单只图标； 但是这个图标没有居中耶，要鼠标移进去才会居中 ### 📷 复现步骤 浏览器宽度调小，比如800px，然后打开 https://preview.pro.ant.design/dashboard/analysis 发现侧边栏图标没有居中 ### © 版本信息 - Ant Design Pro 版本: 4.0.0 - umi 版本 3.1.2 - 浏览器环境 Edge Chromium 81.0.416.77 - 开发环境 macOS

data.title: build(deps-dev): bump eslint from 6.8.0 to 7.1.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

data.body:
Bumps [eslint](https://github.com/eslint/eslint) from 6.8.0 to 7.1.0.
Release notes

Sourced from eslint's releases.

v7.1.0

  • a93083a Fix: astUtils.getNextLocation returns invalid location after CRLF (#13275) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • df01af1 Update: padded-blocks loc position changes (refs #12334) (#13328) (Anix)
  • bd3f092 Fix: max-lines-per-function flagging arrow IIFEs (fixes #13332) (#13336) (cherryblossom000)
  • 25462b2 Update: block-spacing changed loc for extra (refs #12334) (#13314) (Anix)
  • de0aab9 Fix: report end loc in one-var-declaration-per-line (refs #12334) (#13326) (YeonJuan)
  • 1710296 Fix: no-new-symbol false positive with Symbol as an argument (#13337) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • cc01451 Fix: arrow-parens no reporting for comments inside (fixes #12995) (#13312) (Anix)
  • a195141 Update: reporting location for semi-spacing (refs #12334) (#13285) (Anix)
  • e3e4c41 Fix: fix false positives of no-new-func (#13333) (Pig Fang)
  • 611c676 Docs: Update new rules policies (#13343) (Nicholas C. Zakas)
  • 3a5fbb3 Chore: correct fileoverview doc in accessor-pairs (#13335) (YeonJuan)
  • b0a6b81 Update: Improve report location for rest-spread-spacing (refs #12334) (#13313) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • 68c8ee3 Fix: Stop path analyzer on unknown nodes (#13305) (Ilya Volodin)
  • 89e1081 Update: Improve report location for linebreak-style (refs #12334) (#13317) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • 0891379 Docs: Document the "correct" way to build an array with values (#13246) (Ed S)
  • 88127d7 Chore: remove checkbox from PR template prerequesites (#13330) (Kai Cataldo)
  • c636d57 New: no-loss-of-precision (fixes #11279) (#12747) (jmoore914)
  • 72a4e10 Chore: Mark SourceCode getComments() method as deprecated (fixes #13293) (#13296) (SuperOleg39)
  • 7f14846 Docs: fix broken link in Node.js API docs (#13307) (Kai Cataldo)
  • 02aeba1 Sponsors: Sync README with website (ESLint Jenkins)
  • 1f17533 Docs: Gitter -> Discord URL (refs #13039) (#13308) (Nicholas C. Zakas)
  • 82a448a Docs: improve documentation of no-return-await (#13215) (Linus Unnebäck)

data.title: V4版本如何使用第三方的enhanceReduxMiddleware 🧐[问题]
🐛[BUG] 官网预览页面，第一次点击二级菜单，其父级菜单会收起，之后再次点击二级菜单，父菜单正常
data.body:
### 🐛 bug 描述

官网预览页面，第一次点击二级菜单，其父级菜单会收起，之后再次点击二级菜单，父菜单正常

### 📷 复现步骤

官网预览页面，以及创建的项目都有这个问题

### 🏞 期望结果

此为设计如此？如果是，该如何改成父级菜单一直固定？
使用openKeys，进入页面时是打开了父级菜单，但第一次点击子项，父菜单还是会收起，之后就正常了。

### 💻 复现代码

还请尽快回复，非常想用V5，但是该问题会导致用户体验非常差

### © 版本信息

- Ant Design Pro 版本: v5
- umi 版本
- 浏览器环境
- 开发环境win10

data.title: 🧐[问题] 从自建 block 仓库下载区块报错。
data.body:
### 🧐 问题描述

自建 Block 仓库，在使用下面命令时出错：
```bash
$ npx umi block add https://github.com/api7/apisix-dashboard-blocks/tree/master/BlockTemplate
```

从表现来看，是因为真实下载地址变为了 `gitee.com`。

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2106987/82719970-acdd9980-9ce1-11ea-93dd-a5d2ff76bb2b.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2106987/82719971-b6670180-9ce1-11ea-9c54-febdbcd83249.png)

此外，通过 `yarn create umi --type=block` 创建的区块，文档中自动生成的命令是：
```bash
umi block https://github.com/api7/apisix-dashboard-blocks/tree/master/BlockTemplate
```

这个是不正确的。。

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2106987/82720132-2e81f700-9ce3-11ea-8621-f786b60c607e.png)

data.title: 🧐[问题] fetchCurrent接口报错，退出登录页，第一次点击登录，SecurityLayout不渲染，导致需要点击两次
data.body:
### 🧐 问题描述

1.  fetchCurrent(拿用户的相关信息，有token过期时间)接口报错后，退出登录页
2.  点击登录需要点击两次


最后发现第一次点击登录按钮没有触发SecurityLayout的渲染

收缩状态下，点击图标可以切换路由。

data.title: 🐛[BUG] umi 偶尔出现没有导出成员
data.body:
### 🐛 bug 描述
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/23520283/82393463-02633d80-9a79-11ea-9eaa-f57c76179c05.png)

<!--
详细地描述 bug，让大家都能理解
-->

### 📷 复现步骤
偶尔，打开VSCode提示没有导出，start之后没问题
偶尔，打开VSCode正常，start之后提示没有导出
偶尔，打开VSCode提示没有导出，start也没有导出
偶尔，打开VSCode正常，start之后没问题
检查.umi文件夹下是存在导出的
每次碰到都要尝试重新打开VSCode，重新start，不停尝试，偏偏没法提供稳定的重现，令人头大。
搜索下pro和umi的issues，类似问题很多 umijs/umi#4164 umijs/umi#4360 umijs/umi#4341 #6568 #6271 #6581 ，应该不是用户配置问题，非常影响开发体验，如果总是这么不稳定从umi导出所有就有点鸡肋，希望重视啊，不要那么快close

<!--
清晰描述复现步骤，让别人也能看到问题
-->

data.title: 🐛[BUG] protable内存泄漏问题
data.body:
### 🐛 bug 描述

<!--
详细地描述 bug，让大家都能理解
-->

当前版本中，在菜单栏中疯狂切换两个页面（其中至少一个界面使用到了protable组件），那么会报告这个问题：

`devScripts.js:5035 Warning: Can't perform a React state update on an unmounted component. This is a no-op, but it indicates a memory leak in your application. To fix, cancel all subscriptions and asynchronous tasks in a useEffect cleanup function.
    in ProTable (created by Context.Consumer)
    in Provider (created by ProviderWarp)
    in ProviderWarp (at Menu.tsx:169)
    in div (created by PageHeaderWrapper)
    in div (created by GridContent)
    in GridContent (created by PageHeaderWrapper)
    in div (created by PageHeaderWrapper)
    in PageHeaderWrapper (at Menu.tsx:168)
    in MenuList (created by ConnectFunction)
    in ConnectFunction (created by ForwardRef(LoadableComponent))
    in ForwardRef(LoadableComponent) (created by Context.Consumer)
    in Route (created by Context.Consumer)`

### 📷 复现步骤

<!--
清晰描述复现步骤，让别人也能看到问题
-->
在菜单栏中快速且反复切换两个页面（其中至少一个界面使用到了protable组件）

### 🏞 期望结果

<!--
描述你原本期望看到的结果
-->
protable组件的生命周期恢复正常

### 💻 复现代码

<!--
提供可复现的代码，仓库，或线上示例
-->

### © 版本信息

- Ant Design Pro 版本: [e.g. 4.0.0]
- umi 版本
- 浏览器环境
- 开发环境 [e.g. mac OS]

### 🚑 其他信息

<!--
如截图等其他信息可以贴在这里
-->
